features.name: Age
features.description: Dwarves mature at the same rate as humans, but they're considered young until they reach the age of 50. On average, they live about 350 years.

features.name: Alignment
features.description: Most dwarves are lawful, believing firmly in the benefits of a well-ordered society. They tend toward good as well, with a strong sense of fair play and a belief that everyone deserves to share in the benefits of a just order.

features.name: Size
features.description: Dwarves stand between 4 and 5 feet tall and average about 150 pounds. Your size is Medium.

features.name: Speed
features.description: Your speed is not reduced by wearing heavy armor.

features.name: Darkvision
features.description: Accustomed to life underground, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

features.name: Dwarven Resilience
features.description: You have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage.

features.name: Dwarven Combat Training
features.description: You have proficiency with the {@item battleaxe|phb}, {@item handaxe|phb}, {@item light hammer|phb}, and {@item warhammer|phb}.

features.name: Tool Proficiency
features.description: You gain proficiency with the artisan's tools of your choice: {@item Smith's tools|phb}, {@item brewer's supplies|phb}, or {@item mason's tools|phb}.

features.name: Stonecunning
features.description: Whenever you make an Intelligence ({@skill History}) check related to the origin of stonework, you are considered proficient in the {@skill History} skill and add double your proficiency bonus to the check, instead of your normal proficiency bonus.

features.name: Languages
features.description: You can speak, read, and write Common and Dwarvish. Dwarvish is full of hard consonants and guttural sounds, and those characteristics spill over into whatever other language a dwarf might speak.

features.name: Age
features.description: Although elves reach physical maturity at about the same age as humans, the elven understanding of adulthood goes beyond physical growth to encompass worldly experience. An elf typically claims adulthood and an adult name around the age of 100 and can live to be 750 years old.

features.name: Alignment
features.description: Elves love freedom, variety, and self-expression, so they lean strongly toward the gentler aspects of chaos. They value and protect others' freedom as well as their own, and they are more often good than not.

features.name: Size
features.description: Elves range from under 5 to over 6 feet tall and have slender builds. Your size is Medium.

features.name: Darkvision
features.description: Accustomed to twilit forests and the night sky, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

features.name: Keen Senses
features.description: You have proficiency in the {@skill Perception} skill.

features.name: Fey Ancestry
features.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put you to sleep.

features.name: Trance
features.description: Elves don't need to sleep. Instead, they meditate deeply, remaining semiconscious, for 4 hours a day. (The Common word for such meditation is "trance.") While meditating, you can dream after a fashion; such dreams are actually mental exercises that have become reflexive through years of practice. After resting in this way, you gain the same benefit that a human does from 8 hours of sleep.. {@note If you meditate during a long rest, you finish the rest after only 4 hours. You otherwise obey all the rules for a long rest; only the duration is changed.}

features.name: Languages
features.description: You can speak, read, and write Common and Elvish. Elvish is fluid, with subtle intonations and intricate grammar. Elven literature is rich and varied, and their songs and poems are famous among other races. Many bards learn their language so they can add Elvish ballads to their repertoires.

features.name: Age
features.description: Gnomes mature at the same rate humans do, and most are expected to settle down into an adult life by around age 40. They can live 350 to almost 500 years.

features.name: Alignment
features.description: Gnomes are most often good. Those who tend toward law are sages, engineers, researchers, scholars, investigators, or inventors. Those who tend toward chaos are minstrels, tricksters, wanderers, or fanciful jewelers. Gnomes are good-hearted, and even the tricksters among them are more playful than vicious.

features.name: Size
features.description: Gnomes are between 3 and 4 feet tall and average about 40 pounds. Your size is Small.

features.name: Darkvision
features.description: Accustomed to life underground, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

features.name: Gnome Cunning
features.description: You have advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

features.name: Languages
features.description: You can speak, read, and write Common and Gnomish. The Gnomish language, which uses the Dwarvish script, is renowned for its technical treatises and its catalogs of knowledge about the natural world.

features.name: Age
features.description: Half-elves mature at the same rate humans do and reach adulthood around the age of 20. They live much longer than humans, however, often exceeding 180 years.

features.name: Alignment
features.description: Half-elves share the chaotic bent of their elven heritage. They value both personal freedom and creative expression, demonstrating neither love of leaders nor desire for followers. They chafe at rules, resent others' demands, and sometimes prove unreliable, or at least unpredictable.

features.name: Size
features.description: Half-elves are about the same size as humans, ranging from 5 to 6 feet tall. Your size is Medium.

features.name: Darkvision
features.description: Thanks to your elf blood, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

features.name: Fey Ancestry
features.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put you to sleep.

features.name: Skill Versatility
features.description: You gain proficiency in two skills of your choice.

features.name: Languages
features.description: You can speak, read, and write Common, Elvish, and one extra language of your choice.

features.name: Age
features.description: Half-elves mature at the same rate humans do and reach adulthood around the age of 20. They live much longer than humans, however, often exceeding 180 years.

features.name: Alignment
features.description: Half-elves share the chaotic bent of their elven heritage. They value both personal freedom and creative expression, demonstrating neither love of leaders nor desire for followers. They chafe at rules, resent others' demands, and sometimes prove unreliable, or at least unpredictable.

features.name: Size
features.description: Half-elves are about the same size as humans, ranging from 5 to 6 feet tall. Your size is Medium.

features.name: Darkvision
features.description: Thanks to your elf blood, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

features.name: Fey Ancestry
features.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put you to sleep.

features.name: Skill Versatility
features.description: You gain proficiency in two skills of your choice.

features.name: Languages
features.description: You can speak, read, and write Common, Elvish, and one extra language of your choice.

features.name: Age
features.description: Half-orcs mature a little faster than humans, reaching adulthood around age 14. They age noticeably faster and rarely live longer than 75 years.

features.name: Alignment
features.description: Half-orcs inherit a tendency toward chaos from their orc parents and are not strongly inclined toward good. Half-orcs raised among orcs and willing to live out their lives among them are usually evil.

features.name: Size
features.description: Half-orcs are somewhat larger and bulkier than humans, and they range from 5 to well over 6 feet tall. Your size is Medium.

features.name: Darkvision
features.description: Thanks to your orc blood, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

features.name: Menacing
features.description: You gain proficiency in the {@skill Intimidation} skill.

features.name: Relentless Endurance
features.description: When you are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 hit point instead. You can't use this feature again until you finish a long rest.

features.name: Savage Attacks
features.description: When you score a critical hit with a melee weapon attack, you can roll one of the weapon's damage dice one additional time and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.

features.name: Languages
features.description: You can speak, read, and write Common and Orc. Orc is a harsh, grating language with hard consonants. It has no script of its own but is written in the Dwarvish script.

features.name: Age
features.description: A halfling reaches adulthood at the age of 20 and generally lives into the middle of his or her second century.

features.name: Alignment
features.description: Most halflings are lawful good. As a rule, they are good-hearted and kind, hate to see others in pain, and have no tolerance for oppression. They are also very orderly and traditional, leaning heavily on the support of their community and the comfort of their old ways.

features.name: Size
features.description: Halflings average about 3 feet tall and weigh about 40 pounds. Your size is Small.

features.name: Lucky
features.description: When you roll a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

features.name: Brave
features.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

features.name: Halfling Nimbleness
features.description: You can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than yours.

features.name: Languages
features.description: You can speak, read, and write Common and Halfling. The Halfling language isn't secret, but halflings are loath to share it with others. They write very little, so they don't have a rich body of literature. Their oral tradition, however, is very strong. Almost all halflings speak Common to converse with the people in whose lands they dwell or through which they are traveling.

features.name: Age
features.description: Humans reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

features.name: Alignment
features.description: Humans tend toward no particular alignment. The best and the worst are found among them.

features.name: Size
features.description: Humans vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

features.name: Languages
features.description: You can speak, read, and write Common and one extra language of your choice. Humans typically learn the languages of other peoples they deal with, including obscure dialects. They are fond of sprinkling their speech with words borrowed from other tongues: Orc curses, Elvish musical expressions, Dwarvish military phrases, and so on.

features.name: Age
features.description: Tieflings mature at the same rate as humans but live a few years longer.

features.name: Alignment
features.description: Tieflings might not have an innate tendency toward evil, but many of them end up there. Evil or not, an independent nature inclines many tieflings toward a chaotic alignment.

features.name: Size
features.description: Tieflings are about the same size and build as humans. Your size is Medium.

features.name: Darkvision
features.description: Thanks to your infernal heritage, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

features.name: Hellish Resistance
features.description: You have resistance to fire damage.

features.name: Infernal Legacy
features.description: You know the {@spell thaumaturgy} cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell hellish rebuke} spell as a 2nd-level spell; you must finish a long rest in order to cast the spell again using this trait. Once you reach 5th level, you can also cast the {@spell darkness} spell; you must finish a long rest in order to cast the spell again using this trait. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

features.name: Languages
features.description: You can speak, read, and write Common and Infernal.
